synopsis.text:
Deep in the bustling city of Tokyo, Linn Suzuki, a young girl with a determined spirit, stumbles upon an unusual device while evading local ruffians. In her desperate search for her missing brother, Linn has left behind her cruel master in Deep Kyoto and journeyed to Edo. As luck would have it, the captivating and powerful Miho Kuon, head of the Kuon Detective Agency, swoops in to save Linn from her assailants.

Miho, taking a liking to the resilient Linn, affectionately nicknames her "Kotetsu" and offers her a place to stay. However, danger looms as the enigmatic Syndicate sets its sights on the duo for reasons yet unknown. Amidst the chaos, Linn faces an array of challenges, from eccentric magicians to formidable tree spirits, all while struggling to keep her clothes intact!

Filled with adrenaline-pumping action and a healthy dose of fanservice, this martial arts extravaganza promises a thrilling ride as Linn navigates her new life in Edo and uncovers the secrets that bind her to Miho and the Syndicate.
